statements.select: select * from Banco order by NOMBRE
statements.update: UPDATE Banco NOMBRE = ?, SWIFT = ?, WHERE CODBAN= ?;
statements.insert: INSERT INTO Banco (NOMBRE, SWIFT, CODBAN) VALUES (?, ?, ?);
